methodDescription:
Sign up for an affiliate by executing the following steps
- Validate affiliate account attribute
- Validate affiliate user account
- Create affiliate
- Create a new affiliate user with the id from the newly created affiliate
- Save Affiliate meta information
- Perform fraud validation and calulate fraud score
- Update affiliate status from active to pending if fraud score exceeds the fraud threshold
- Send alert to employee to notify affiliate and affiliate user have had been created

Admin user create internal affiliate account,
only need to have the company required

returnDescription: Returns an affiliate id or affiliate object
Returns an affiliate id or affiliate object
